name: ScalFibo
short_description: An indispensable assistant to manage scalping strategy with Fibonacci. Use intraday retracement to intercept a clear and clean trigger.

params.title: ScalFibo x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Average Period
params.content: The number of bars to be considered for averaging

params.title: Min Average
params.content: The minimum value of the average to be considered for the implementation of the strategy

params.title: Min Bars for Activation
params.content: The minimum number of candles to be considered before the trigger can be activated

params.title: Max Bars for Activation
params.content: The maximum number of candles to be considered after the trigger can be deactivated

params.title: True K
params.content: The number of pips added to the high or low to consider a new high or low, the price must close over

params.title: On Trade Opportunity?
params.content: You can choose to activate the popup when a trade opportunity start

params.title: On Fibonacci Drawing?
params.content: You can choose to activate the popup when Fibonacci is drawn on the chart

params.title: On Strategy Hit?
params.content: You can choose to activate the popup when the strategy conditions are active

params.title: Enabled?
params.content: You can choose whether to enable sending a message to a webhook, the following parameters must be replaced with the correct values

params.title: POST params
params.content: The data to be sent to the webhook

params.title: General
params.content: The parameter names define the significance of the values
